text: Lady in White may refer to: * Lady in White, a 1988 American horror movie * The Lady in White, a 1938 Italian comedy movie * Lady in White (Toorop), a painting * "The Lady in White" (American Horror Story), an episode of the TV series * The Lady in White (Perla Siedle Gibson), a singer in Durban during World War II ==See also== * Ladies in White, a Cuban opposition movement * White Lady (disambiguation) * The Woman in White (disambiguation)
title: Lady in White (disambiguation)
